trans-unit.source: dotnet-build command | Microsoft Docs
trans-unit.target: dotnet-build 命令 | Microsoft Docs

trans-unit.source: The dotnet-build command builds a project and all of its dependencies.
trans-unit.target: dotnet-build 命令會建置專案和其所有相依性。

trans-unit.source: dotnet-build, CLI, CLI command, .NET Core
trans-unit.target: dotnet-build, CLI, CLI 命令, .NET Core

trans-unit.source: dotnet-build (Tooling Preview 4)
trans-unit.target: dotnet-build (工具 Preview 4)

trans-unit.source: This topic applies to Visual Studio 2017 RC - .NET Core Tools Preview 4.
trans-unit.target: 此主題適用於 Visual Studio 2017 RC - .NET Core 工具 Preview 4。

trans-unit.source: For the .NET Core Tools Preview 2 version, see the [dotnet-build](../../tools/dotnet-build.md) topic.
trans-unit.target: .NET Core 工具 Preview 2 版本，請參閱 [dotnet-build](../../tools/dotnet-build.md) 主題。

trans-unit.source: Name
trans-unit.target: 名稱

trans-unit.source: dotnet-build -- Builds a project and all of its dependencies
trans-unit.target: dotnet-build -- 建置專案和其所有相依性

trans-unit.source: Synopsis
trans-unit.target: 概要

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The `dotnet build` command builds multiple source file from a source project and its dependencies into a binary.
trans-unit.target: `dotnet build` 命令會將來源專案中的多個來源檔案和其相依性建置成二進位檔。

trans-unit.source: By default, the resulting binary is in Intermediate Language (IL) and has a DLL extension.
trans-unit.target: 產生的二進位檔預設為中繼語言 (IL)，並且具有 DLL 擴充功能。

trans-unit.source: `dotnet build` also drops a `*.deps` file which outlines what the host needs to run the application.
trans-unit.target: `dotnet build` 也會放置 `*.deps` 檔案，這個檔案概述主機執行應用程式所需的作業。

trans-unit.source: Building requires the existence of an asset file (a file that lists all of the dependencies of your application), which means that you have to run [`dotnet restore`](dotnet-restore.md) prior to building your code.
trans-unit.target: 建置會要求資產檔案 (列出應用程式所有相依性的檔案) 確實存在，這表示您必須先執行 [`dotnet restore`](dotnet-restore.md)，才能建置程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Before any compilation begins, the `build` verb analyzes the project and its dependencies for incremental safety checks.
trans-unit.target: 開始進行任何編譯之前，`build` 動詞會分析專案和其相依性來進行累加安全性檢查。

trans-unit.source: If all checks pass, then build proceeds with incremental compilation of the project and its dependencies; otherwise, it falls back to non-incremental compilation.
trans-unit.target: 如果所有檢查都通過，則建置會繼續對專案和其相依性進行累加編譯；否則，會回復為非累加編譯。

trans-unit.source: Via a profile flag, users can choose to receive additional information on how they can improve their build times.
trans-unit.target: 透過設定檔旗標，使用者可以選擇接收如何改善其建置時間的其他資訊。

trans-unit.source: In order to build an executable application instead of a library, you need to set the `<OutputType>` property:
trans-unit.target: 若要建置可執行的應用程式而非程式庫，您必須設定 `<OutputType>` 屬性：

trans-unit.source: Options
trans-unit.target: 選項

trans-unit.source: Prints out a short help for the command.
trans-unit.target: 印出命令的簡短說明。

trans-unit.source: Directory in which to place the built binaries.
trans-unit.target: 在其中放置已建置的二進位檔的目錄。

trans-unit.source: You also need to define `--framework` when you specify this option.
trans-unit.target: 當您指定這個選項時，也需要定義 `--framework`。

trans-unit.source: Compiles for a specific framework.
trans-unit.target: 針對特定架構進行編譯。

trans-unit.source: The framework needs to be defined in the [project file](csproj.md).
trans-unit.target: 架構必須定義於[專案檔](csproj.md)中。

trans-unit.source: Defines a configuration under which to build.
trans-unit.target: 定義用來建置的組態。

trans-unit.source: If omitted, it defaults to `Debug`.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略，會預設為 `Debug`。

trans-unit.source: Target runtime to build for.
trans-unit.target: 要建置的目標執行階段。

trans-unit.source: For a list of Runtime Identifiers (RIDs) you can use, see the [RID catalog](../../rid-catalog.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需您可以使用的執行階段識別項 (RID) 清單，請參閱 [RID 目錄](../../rid-catalog.md)。

trans-unit.source: Defines what `*` should be replaced with in the version field in the project file.
trans-unit.target: 定義專案檔的 version 欄位中應該取代的 `*`。

trans-unit.source: The format follows NuGet's version guidelines.
trans-unit.target: 格式遵循 NuGet 的版本指導方針。

trans-unit.source: Prints out the incremental safety checks that users need to address in order for incremental compilation to be automatically turned on.
trans-unit.target: 印出累加安全性檢查，而使用者需要進行解決，才能自動開啟累加編譯。

trans-unit.source: Marks the build as unsafe for incremental build.
trans-unit.target: 針對累加建置，將建置標示為不安全。

trans-unit.source: This turns off incremental compilation and forces a clean rebuild of the project dependency graph.
trans-unit.target: 這會關閉累加編譯，並強制全新重建專案相依性圖形。

trans-unit.source: Ignores project-to-project references and only builds the root project specified to build.
trans-unit.target: 忽略專案對專案參考，並且只會建置指定要建置的根專案。

trans-unit.target: 範例

trans-unit.target: 使用發行組態來建置專案和其相依性︰

trans-unit.source: Build a project and its dependencies for a specific runtime (in this example, Ubuntu 16.04):
trans-unit.target: 針對特定執行階段，建置專案和其相依性 (在此範例中為 Ubuntu 16.04)：
